Unlockable Outfits in The Mercenaries On the character select screen for The Mercenaries hold the following buttons while choosing the following characters. Unlockable How to Unlock Hold RB and press A Ada with Assignment Ada outfit Hold Y and press A Ada with Separate Ways outfit Hold Y and RB then press A Leon with Gangster outfit Hold Y and press A Leon with jacket Hold RB and press A Leon with RPD outfit (RE2) Contributed By: Monolith82.
